mapper.select:
select distinct t.id, t.storecode, t.storename, t.queryword, t.creator, to_char(t.cdate,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') cdate, t.updater, to_char(t.udate,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') udate, t.usermemo, decode(t.types,2,'厂内单位',3,'作业点') types from b_storename_t t where t.validflag > 0 and t.storecode like 'S%'
and instr(storename,#{storename})>0
and instr(storecode,#{storecode})>0
and instr(queryword,upper(#{queryword}))>0
and (t.types = 2 or t.types = 3)
and instr(t.types,#{types})>0
order by t.storecode desc
select count(0) from b_storename_t t where t.storename =#{storename} and t.validflag>0 and t.storecode like 'S%' and (types=2 or types=3)
mapper.insert:
select b_storename_s.nextval from dual
insert into b_storename_t t ( t.id, t.validflag, t.storecode, t.storename, t.queryword, t.creator, t.cdate, t.types, t.usermemo ) values( #{id,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, 1, #{storecode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{storename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{queryword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sysdate, #{types,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{usermemo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
